data.message: Restructure comfy-api-service to Olootu BYOC Template Platform: Complete restructure: renamed repo to olootu, package apps→olootu, creator→studio, worker→runner, workflows→templates. Created core/ module with TemplateSpec, ProviderAdapter interface, and PipelineExecutor. Updated all imports (46 files), Dockerfile, docker-compose. Updated README and CLAUDE.md with new architecture.
data.task: Restructure comfy-api-service to Olootu BYOC Template Platform
data.outcome: Complete restructure: renamed repo to olootu, package apps→olootu, creator→studio, worker→runner, workflows→templates.
